proposal: Diving into the digital realm with ₿190,000 BTC, Michael Saylor isn't just about holding; he's shaping the future of education and advocating for the Bitcoin Standard. Congrats on reaching 167 holders in the ETH network! Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools to further empower your vision, allowing the community to not just learn but actively participate. Let's bridge the gap between education and practical application.
